body_html: @xysmlx Thanks for your help. I had tried the cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py example. i only use my data with batch_size=8,features=20000. but when use one gpu for backpropagation，the gpu was used 15G. so i can't increase features to 90000.
body_text: @xysmlx Thanks for your help. I had tried the cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py example.  i only use my data with batch_size=8,features=20000. but when use one gpu for backpropagation，the gpu was used 15G. so i can't increase features to 90000.
body: @xysmlx Thanks for your help. I had tried the `cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py` example.  i only use my data with batch_size=8,features=20000. but when use one gpu for backpropagation，the gpu was used 15G. so i can't increase features to 90000.
